info.name: Project Management API
info.description: The Project Management API allows you to create, update and delete projects and tasks, as well as add and manage comments. With authentication via Laravel Sanctum and properly documented endpoints, it provides a secure and well-organized solution for project management and collaboration.

item.name: Account Management
item.description:
The Account Management encompasses endpoints dedicated to managing user profiles and profile pictures.
It includes operations for viewing and updating profile information as well as managing the associated profile picture.

request.description: Retrieves detailed information from the authenticated user's profile, including personal data and profile picture.
Updates the authenticated user's profile information, allowing modifications to personal data
Updates the authenticated user's profile picture or stores a new image if none exists.
Retrieves the authenticated user's profile picture.
Deletes the authenticated user's profile picture.

item.name: Project Comments
item.description: APIs for managing comments on projects.

item.name: Shows all comments for a project
Create a comment for a project

response.name: Missing content field
Content field with fewer characters than the minimum
Content field with more characters than the maximum

item.name: Show a specific comment in the project

request.description: Lists projects that the user has created or projects to which they have a task assigned.

body.raw: {"title":"optio","description":"Doloribus rerum consequatur sit quis qui possimus esse.","start_at":"cumque","end_at":"ad","status":"'in-progress'"}

request.description: View a project with its tasks and comments.

body.raw: {"title":"sequi","description":"Voluptatibus repellat sequi eum neque rerum possimus odit.","start_at":"facilis","end_at":"labore","status":"'available-soon'"}

item.name: Task Comments
item.description: APIs for managing comments on tasks within projects.

item.name: Shows all comments for a task
Create a comment for a task

response.name: Missing content field
Content field with fewer characters than the minimum
Content field with more characters than the maximum

item.name: Show a specific comment in the task
Tasks
item.description:
The Tasks group includes endpoints designed for task management.
It provides comprehensive functionality for handling tasks, covering all aspects from creation and viewing to updating and removal.
This group offers a thorough approach to managing and maintaining tasks associated with the user.

request.description: Retrieves a list of all tasks associated with the project.
Creates a new task based on the provided information, adding it to the user's task set.
Retrieves details of a specific task, allowing for a complete view of the selected task’s information.
Updates the information of an existing task based on the provided modifications.
Removes a specific task from the user's task set, permanently deleting it.
Retrieves a list of tasks assigned to the user, allowing them to view tasks under their responsibility.

item.name: User management
item.description:
This API provides comprehensive authentication management capabilities, including user registration, login, and logout operations.
Its endpoints allow for secure user authentication, issuance of access tokens, ensuring data protection and adherence to security best practices.

request.description: It is at this endpoint that you will obtain the Bearer token to access other routes that require authentication.
On this endpoint you log out the user and remove their Bearer token.
This endpoint generates and sends the email to reset the user's password.
